short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds links to bookmarks via the contextmenu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a simple "Bookmark link" entry to Chrome's context-menu (right-click menu), reminiscent of the Firefox functionality. Bookmarked links will be saved to Chrome's Other Bookmarks folder.
